description:
A snug fit for warmth, and lots of range of motion for splashing. Flatlock seams create a smooth surface when kids are swimming, paddling and waving to neighbours on the dock.

  • Made of 1.2mm Thermo-Stretch neoprene
  • Skin-tight fit for warmth
  • Full-length zipper back with Velcro flap for easy on and off
  • Raglan style sleeves offers full range of motion
name: Level Six Hybrid Shorty Wetsuit - Youths
